sentences.en: All roads are blocked by the heavy snowfall. The passengers are in danger.
sentences.cn: 所有道路均被大雪所阻塞, 旅客处于危险之中.

sentences.en: All roads were blocked by the heavy snowfall.
sentences.cn: 所有道路均为大雪所阻塞.

sentences.en: an average snowfall of eight inches a year
sentences.cn: 每年平均八英寸的降雪量

sentences.en: Black smoke and red flames climb into the white snowfall.
sentences.cn: 黑色的浓烟和红色的火舌在漫天飞雪中缭绕上升.

sentences.en: I'm afraid it won't be cold enough for a snowfall.
sentences.cn: 我恐怕天不会冷的下雪.

sentences.en: Several villages have been isolated by the heavy snowfall.
sentences.cn: 好几个村庄因大雪与外界隔绝.

sentences.en: Snowfall averages out in this part of the country at twenty inches a year.
sentences.cn: 我国这个地区每年的平均降雪量为20英寸.

sentences.en: The heavy snowfall gave Tom pause about going out for the movie.
sentences.cn: 这场大雪使得汤姆为出门看电影踌躇.

sentences.en: The heavy snowfall isolated several villages from outside world.
sentences.cn: 大雪把好几个村庄与外界隔开.

sentences.en: The snowfall was becoming heavier ; it was sticking to the ground now.
sentences.cn: 雪是愈下愈密了, 街上已经见白.

sentences.en: The total rain and snowfall amounted to 50mm.
sentences.cn: 降雨量和降雪量共达50毫米。

sentences.en: There was a heavy snowfall last week.
Though it is spring, there would be a heavy snowfall.
sentences.cn: 虽然是春天, 也可能会下一场大雪.

sentences.en: Three inches of snowfall had fallen.
We had a light snowfall last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我们这儿下了场小雪.

sentences.en: We have had incessant snowfall since yesterday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 从昨天下午开始就持续不断地下雪.

trans.tran_en: an occasion when snow falls from the sky, or the amount that falls in a particular period of time
